pullrequest.title: Issue#96 Add Thrust Angle and Rotation Joint

content.raw:
* There is a lint tool for Gazebo - see `sh tools/code_check.sh ` at [http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=contrib\_code&cat=development#Style](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=contrib_code&cat=development#Style)  
  We’ve been toying with the idea of customizing that and including it within VRX as a way to help with style consistency.
* Doing a quick visual check the PID settings look good to me.  They are definitely snappy - maybe quicker than a typical electromechanical implementation, but I think that is a good place to start.
content.html:
• There is a lint tool for Gazebo - see sh tools/code_check.sh at http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=contrib_code&cat=development#Style
    We’ve been toying with the idea of customizing that and including it within VRX as a way to help with style consistency.
  • Doing a quick visual check the PID settings look good to me. They are definitely snappy - maybe quicker than a typical electromechanical implementation, but I think that is a good place to start.
